headline: One Year On, JPMorganChase Shares Progress on £40M Investment in the U.K. and Deploys £3.3M to Boost Career Opportunities Across the Country
text: NEW YORK, May 13, 2025--As JPMorganChase continues to deliver on the £40 million commitment made in May 2024, which aims to help drive inclusive economic growth across the U.K., the firm is sharing progress and investing in new programmes to create career opportunities.

headline: JPMorganChase to Present at the Morgan Stanley U.S. Financials Conference
text: NEW YORK, May 12, 2025--Jamie Dimon, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of JPMorganChase, will present at the Morgan Stanley U.S. Financials Conference at the InterContinental Barclay Hotel in New York City on Tuesday, June 10, 2025, at 1:00 p.m. (Eastern).

headline: Campbell Global Announces Leadership Transition: Angie Davis to Succeed John Gilleland as CEO
text: Campbell Global, a leader in forestland investing and management, and a vital part of J.P. Morgan Asset Management's $400 billion alternatives business, is pleased to announce a significant leadership transition. Angie Davis, currently serving as President of Campbell Global, will succeed John Gilleland as Chief Executive Officer, effective October 1.

headline: JP Morgan creates new green banking leadership role
text: LONDON (Reuters) -JP Morgan has bolstered its green finance and advisory offering in Europe with a new division head to support clients across renewable energy and green technology. The Wall Street lender has promoted Kai-Christian Nerger to the newly created role of head of green economy banking for Europe within its global corporate banking business, an internal memo seen by Reuters on Thursday said. Nerger, who has been at JP Morgan for more than 10 years, will lead a team helping the bank's European clients reduce their carbon emissions and benefit from growth opportunities in the green economy.

text: Campbell Global, a leader in forestland investing and management, and a vital part of J.P. Morgan Asset Management's $400 billion alternatives business, is pleased to announce a significant leadership transition.
